commit message: Upgrade database to kick out empty books that were added due to a bug
fixed issue where snackbar's theme was not getting set properly
Updated gitignore to ignore mac files
Theme correctly so always the opposite theme is shown
Theme only dark theme as light is already themed
Use the views context and theme only if we are in dark mode as light mode is already themed by the snackbar
Use coordinator layout as top element so the snackbar can operate in all areas.
Repair defect database entries where the path has not been saved correctly.
